title: Incorrect "Build" popup action enablement
description: The bug report mentions an issue with the enablement of the "Build" popup action.
OB: The enablement of the "Build" popup action is incorrect.
EB: The "Build" popup action should be enabled only when a manual build is needed. If the build is already done, it should be automatically triggered.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the software.
2. Perform actions that trigger the "Build" popup action.
3. Observe the enablement status of the "Build" popup action.
